values: The Pleasure of God in the Good of His PeopleThe Pleasure of God in the Good of His People

God does not
      do you good out of some constraint or coercion. He is free! And in
      his freedom he overflows in joy to do you good.
      God does not
    do you good out of some constraint or coercion. He is free! And in
    his freedom he overflows in joy to do you good.
